Reviews.Title: Great Cmaera
Reviews.Author: LauraV
Reviews.Content: I've used similar spec camera's from other manufacturers but this unit is superior to anything i've used in the past.It's built like a tank and very easy to install

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Marc Swanson
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with great features for difficult environments. It includes all necessary hardware. I somehow was able to get this thing to work over 456 feet of CAT6 using POE!!
